docs.snippet: A South Korean court convicted on Friday a former head of the local unit of the British consumer goods maker Reckitt Benckiser over the sale of humidifier sterilizers linked to deadly lung injuries, sentencing him to seven years in prison, Yonhap ...
docs.lead_paragraph: A South Korean court convicted on Friday a former head of the local unit of the British consumer goods maker Reckitt Benckiser over the sale of humidifier sterilizers linked to deadly lung injuries, sentencing him to seven years in prison, Yonhap news agency said.

headline.main: South Korea Court Convicts Ex-Reckitt Benckiser Unit Chief in Sterilizer Case
headline.print_headline: South Korea Court Convicts Ex-Reckitt Benckiser Unit Chief in Sterilizer Case
